Description: A powerful multi channel marketing platform.
Name: Sentori

Methods.Name: Email Interactions (URL)
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact clicks External Links with a specified prefix (e.g. 'http://www.mywebsite.com/') from within any Emails.

Methods.Name: Email Interactions (All)
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact clicks any External Links from within any Emails.

Methods.Name: Mailing List Subscribed
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact subscribes to a Mailing List.

Methods.Name: Contact Subscribed
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact in your Sentori system signs up. A valid sign up for the event is when a contact clicks an Opt-In Confirmation link in an email or when a new contact is manually added by a User.  New contacts added as part of a bulk data upload of a spreadsheet or .csv file will not cause the event to trigger.

Methods.Name: Contact Unsubscribed
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact in your Sentori system unsubscribes.

Methods.Name: Email Bounced
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when an email sent by your Sentori system bounces.

Methods.Name: Email Interaction (Single Link)
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact clicks an external link within an Email.  If the email is a 'test email' then the event will be triggered every time the interaction is detected.  For other emails the event is triggered only on the first interaction.

Methods.Name: Mailing List Unsubscribed
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact unsubscribes from a Mailing List.

Methods.Name: Email Interaction (Open)
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact opens a specific Email or clicks an external link within it.  If the email is a 'test email' then the event will be triggered every time the interaction is detected.  For other emails the event is triggered only on the first interaction.

Methods.Name: Form Submitted
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact submits a Form.

Methods.Name: Form Submission Confirmed
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact confirms a Form submission.

Methods.Name: Email Interaction (Open All)
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when a Contact opens any Email or clicks an external link (which also triggers an Open).  If the email is a 'test email' then the event will be triggered every time the interaction is detected.  For other emails the event is triggered only on the first interaction with each.

Methods.Name: Email Send Completed
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when an Email send completes.

Methods.Name: Email Send Completed (All)
Methods.Description: This event can be used to trigger a Cycle or Workflow when any Email send completes.

Methods.Name: Import Contacts
Methods.Description: This step allows you to upload a number of contact records at the same time.  Sentori will check to see if contacts already exist using the email address.  If a contact is found to be in the contact list already an update to their details will be performed.  If a record cannot be found then the contact will be added.

Methods.Name: Create Contact
Methods.Description: Creates a new Contact.  Note: if a Contact already exists with the email address, an update will NOT be performed.

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Updates an existing Contact's details.  Note: if a Contact cannot be found with the email address, a new Contact will NOT be created.

Methods.Name: Add/Update Contact
Methods.Description: Adds or updates a Contact as appropriate.

Methods.Name: Unsubscribe Contact
Methods.Description: Completely Unsubscribes a Contact so they no longer receive any emails.

Methods.Name: Check Contact Exists by ID
Methods.Description: Checks whether a Contact exists with the given Contact ID.

Methods.Name: Get Contact by ID
Methods.Description: Gets a single Contact by the Contact ID.

Methods.Name: Get Contact by Email Address
Methods.Description: Gets a Contact by their Email Address.

Methods.Name: Delete Contact
Methods.Description: Deletes a Contact including information such as their Mailing List subscriptions and Tagging.  Email interactions (i.e. Opens and Clicks) will be kept so Email KPI numbers will NOT be affected.

Methods.Name: Get Email KPIs
Methods.Description: Gets the Key Performance Indicators (Opens, Clicks, etc) for an Email.

Methods.Name: Get Clickers by Email and Link
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that have clicked a particular Link in an Email.

Methods.Name: Get Clickers by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that have clicked any Links in an Email.

Methods.Name: Get Abuse by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that have complained that an Email was spam.

Methods.Name: Get Bounces by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that have resulted in a bounce when an Email was sent.

Methods.Name: Get Opens by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that have been detected as opening an Email.

Methods.Name: Get Social Shares by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that have shared an Email on social networks.

Methods.Name: Get Unsubscribes by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that unsubscribed from an Email.

Methods.Name: Get Sent by Email
Methods.Description: Gets the Contacts that have been sent an Email.

Methods.Name: Create Email
Methods.Description: Creates a new Draft Email from an Email Template.

Methods.Name: Attach Upload Group to Draft Email
Methods.Description: Attaches an Upload Group to a Draft Email.

Methods.Name: List Email Templates
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Email Templates in the Account.

Methods.Name: List Draft Emails
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Draft Emails in the Account.

Methods.Name: List Sent Emails
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the Emails that have been sent from the Account.

Methods.Name: Send Email
Methods.Description: The Send Email functionality is provided by adding the Contact to an Autoresponder.  The Autoresponder can be set to send a single or multiple Emails at preset intervals.

Methods.Name: Subscribe to Mailing List
Methods.Description: Subscribes a Contact to a Mailing List.

Methods.Name: Unsubscribe Mailing List
Methods.Description: Unsubscribes a Contact from a Mailing List.

Methods.Name: List Mailing Lists
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Mailing Lists in the Account.

Methods.Name: Get Mailing List
Methods.Description: Gets a single Mailing List.

Methods.Name: Get Mailing List Subscribers
Methods.Description: Gets a list of the Contacts who are subscribed to a Mailing List.

Methods.Name: Add Contact to Autoresponder
Methods.Description: Adds the Contact to an Autoresponder.  The Autoresponder can be set to send a single or multiple Emails at preset intervals.

Methods.Name: List Autoresponders
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all the Autoresponders in the Account.

Methods.Name: List Upload Groups
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Upload Groups in the Account.

Methods.Name: List Audiences
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Audiences in the Account.

Methods.Name: Get Audience Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of the Contacts that match an Audience's criteria.

Methods.Name: List Signup Forms
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Signup Forms in the Account.

Methods.Name: Get All Future Events
Methods.Description: Gets a list of all Events in the Account that haven't yet past.

Methods.Name: Get Event
Methods.Description: Gets a single Event.

Methods.Name: Get Attendee Status Values
Methods.Description: Gets a list of the Attendee Status values for the Account.

Methods.Name: Get Event Contacts
Methods.Description: Gets a list of the Contacts for an Event.

Methods.Name: Get Event Contacts by Status
Methods.Description: Gets a list of the Contacts with a particular Status for an Event.

Methods.Name: Add/Update Contact in Event
Methods.Description: Adds a Contact to an Event with the specified Status, or updates them if they already exist in the Event.

Methods.Name: Get Contact Event Status
Methods.Description: Gets a Contact's Status within an Event, if they've been added to it.

Methods.Name: List Events
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Events from a specified number of days in the past onwards.

Methods.Name: Remove Contact from Event
Methods.Description: Removes a Contact from an Event.

MetaDescription: Automate your Sentori marketing suite to create advanced marketing automation campaigns across multiple applications.
